activation.title: Authentication Required
activation.description:
To complete authentication, follow the instructions at this URL: {auth_url}
Once finished, press SUBMIT to continue.

description_placeholders.auth_url: URL to visit to complete authentication

reauth_activation.title: Authentication Required
reauth_activation.description:
Authentication is required again. Follow the instructions at this URL: {auth_url}
Once completed, press SUBMIT to continue.

description_placeholders.auth_url: URL to visit to complete authentication

error.expired: The code has expired. A new link was generated, please try again now.

abort.reauth_successful: Reauthentication completed successfully. You may now close this window.

tado_binary_home_state.name: Mode
tado_binary_home_state.description: Indicates whether someone is at home

tado_binary_open_windows.name: Windows
tado_binary_open_windows.description: Indicates if there are open windows

auth_not_started.title: Authentication Not Started
auth_not_started.description: Complete authentication for {{ title }}. Go to the integration configuration to proceed.

auth_pending.title: Authentication Pending
auth_pending.description: Complete the pending authentication for {{ title }} in the Tado UI.
